scripts.transpile: babel src --out-dir cocos/src --source-maps && babel main.js --out-dir cocos/ --source-maps
scripts.win32-build: npm run transpile && cd cocos && MSBuild build/GaloJs.sln /p:Configuration=Release /p:Platform="win32" && .\build\bin\GaloJs\Release\GaloJs.exe
scripts.build: npm run transpile && cocos.bat run --proj-dir cocos -p web
scripts.release: cd cocos && cocos.bat compile -p web -m release
